page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Ribby Hall Park is a Leisure Village where these sports are played. Squash,badminton,netball,football, basketball,bowls,pool,table tennis,B.M.X.cycle riding and there is even an adventure playground.It has two big sports halls,six squash courts and six badminton courts.There is also a camping and caravan site.There are lots of facilaties for the campers which inclde a shop,wahing machines,tumble dryers,sinks,showers,toilets,sunbeds,a sauna and an arcade. They also have a bar,an inn and a restaurant there.
